bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.description:
Specified unit test is failing, after this PR: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/1962>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/1962</denchmark-link>
PR above was necessary - all gradient checks were failing as a result of those removed lines.

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
